| HistoryText             = The Manstrosities were a group of horribly mutated homeless people abducted by [[Jack Hammer (Earth-616)|Patient Zero]]. They had a control unit implanted in their necks which not only made them completely obedient to their creator, but also provided their body with pain dampeners and dopamine boosters to prevent them from becoming self-aware and lose all will to live.

Patient Zero unleashed his Manstrosities at [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] and [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] when they had tracked him down.{{r|Spider-Man/Deadpool Vol 1 8}}

| Trivia                  = * One of the Man-Strosities resembles the spirit [[w:c:spiritedaway:No-Face (Kaonashi)|No-Face (Kaonashi)]] from the Japanese animated film ''Spirited Away'' by Studio Ghibli.
